ovdesc.p: This table is used to define the accumulator details for Risk Filter.
Inside accumulator table there shall not be any amount netting based on debit or credit.
Periods can be daily, weekly and monthly.

desc.p: Unique ID to identify the filter and also used to store the condition accumulator.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Latest exhausted limit for the day (cumulative payment amount for current day which has been processed for this condition).
Latest exhausted limit for the week (cumulative payment amount for current week which has been processed for this condition).
Latest exhausted limit for the month (cumulative payment amount for current month which has been processed for this condition).
Latest exhausted payment count limit for the day for this condition.
Latest exhausted payment count limit for the week for this condition.
Latest exhausted payment count limit for the month for this condition.
